name: Astra Mayonnaise
description: Astra Mayonnaise is the ideal partner for moms with picky eating kids. Use as a topping, dressing or even a spread on food items like vegetables, grains like chickpea and corn, and salad to make your dish more tasty and nutritious. Astra mayo contains real egg yolk making it superior to its competitors that use artificial egg flavouring. Astra Mayonnaise is perfect for healthy family meals. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
